nodes.text: G0-A1 was an astromech droid that served the reconstituted Sith Empire. During the fighting in Section X on the planet Belsavis during the Galactic War, G0-A1 was sent by General Avrun back to Crag Outpost for aid.
G0-A1 appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as the Imperial courier for the HK-51 missions, which were added in Game Update 1.5: HK-51 Activated.
